startNewChat.title: Start New Chat
startNewChat.message: Are you sure you want to start a new chat? This will clear the current conversation.

deleteConversation.title: Are you sure?
deleteConversation.message: This will permanently delete the chat conversation. This action cannot be undone.

archiveTranscript.title: Archive Transcript
archiveTranscript.message: Are you sure you want to archive "{fileName}"? This will move the file to an archive location and it will no longer be actively used for real-time context unless restored.

saveTranscriptToMemory.title: Save Transcript to Memory
saveTranscriptToMemory.message: This will summarize the transcript and save it as a new memory file. The original transcript will then be moved to a 'saved' archive. This process cannot be undone. Proceed with "{fileName}"?

forgetChatMemory.title: Forget Memory
forgetChatMemory.message_prefix: Are you sure you want us to permanently forget this memory?

deleteMessage.title: Are you sure?
deleteMessage.message: This will permanently delete the message from this chat and saved memories. This action cannot be undone.

memoryActions.saveMessage: Do you want to save this message to our memory?
memoryActions.saveConversation: Do you want to save the entire conversation to our memory?
memoryActions.overwriteConversation: Do you want to save the entire conversation to our memory? This will replace the current saved version and canâ€™t be undone.
memoryActions.forgetMessage: This will permanently delete the saved memory for this message. This action cannot be undone.
memoryActions.forgetConversation: This will permanently delete the saved memory for this conversation. This action cannot be undone.

clearAllTranscripts.title: Clear All Transcripts
clearAllTranscripts.message: Are you sure you want to clear all completed transcripts? This action cannot be undone.

exitAgentWizard.title: Exit Agent Creation?
exitAgentWizard.message: Are you sure you want to exit? All progress, including chat history and uploaded files for this new agent, will be lost.

switchAgentWhileRecording.title: Switch agent while recording?
switchAgentWhileRecording.message: You are currently recording. Switching agents will stop the recording. Do you want to proceed?
